channel.title: Python on Data Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Data Notes
channel.item:
One-Way ANOVA in Python /post/one-way-anova-in-python/ Sun, 27 May 2018 00:00:00 +0000
/post/one-way-anova-in-python/ <<<<<<< HEAD Installing and Loading the Reticulate Package This package allows us to run Python 3 inside R Markdown chunks. You will need Python 3 installed. There are details on how to do that in the Resources section. I also needed to change Reticulate’s settings to point it at Python 3 on my Mac. You can find those details here. ======= knitr::opts_chunk$set('python', engine.path = '/usr/local/Cellar/python/3.6.5/bin/python3') Installing and Loading the Reticulate Package This package allows us to run Python 3 inside R Markdown chunks. You will need Python 3 installed. There are details on how to do that in the Resources section of the blog. I also needed to change Reticulate’s settings to point it at Python3 on my Mac. You can find those details here. >>>>>>> f3627af34d7dd9bfbf80e39b73eea709996d4124 Of course, you do not need to run Python from Rstudio, or within the R framework.
